generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene back cover design in a dreamy fantasy anime style, continuing the magical theme. A single, elegant branch from a silver-barked tree, with delicate amethyst-colored leaves, gracefully curves in from the upper left side of the card. A few soft, glowing orbs of light, reminiscent of those on the front cover, are nestled among the leaves, casting a gentle, peaceful luminescence. The background is a soft, blended watercolor wash of the same pink and purple tones from the front cover's celestial sky, creating a tranquil and ethereal atmosphere. The bottom-right corner is left completely clear and undecorated, with the design elements focused towards the center and left.
generatedPrompts.frontCover: A dreamy fantasy anime style illustration of a mystical forest scene. In the center, two elegantly stylized, ethereal figures, representing a couple, are gently touching hands. They have soft, flowing hair adorned with tiny glowing flowers and are dressed in sophisticated, flowing garments of pearlescent white and soft lavender. They stand on a path made of shimmering mother-of-pearl, which winds through a forest of luminous, silver-barked trees with amethyst-colored leaves. Floating, glowing orbs of light drift through the air like fireflies, casting a soft, magical glow. In the background, a serene celestial sky transitions from soft pink to dusky purple, with a hint of a crescent moon. Centered on the card, the text 'Happy Birthday Sarah' is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, glowing softly with a warm, golden light.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An enchanting, full-bleed illustration in a dreamy fantasy anime style, depicting a 'Celestial Orrery of Dreams'. This is a beautiful, intricate mechanical model of a solar system, but instead of planets, the spheres are made of shimmering, opalescent crystal and glowing gemstones in soft pastel shades of pink, lavender, and periwinkle. The orrery floats against a deep, starry nebula background filled with soft, swirling cosmic dust. The delicate, golden rings and arms of the orrery catch the starlight, and tiny constellations made of pinpricks of light are visible in the distance. The scene is magical, sophisticated, and deeply imaginative, evoking a sense of wonder and infinite possibility, with a quiet, elegant tone.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A sophisticated and artistic design in a dreamy fantasy anime style, framing the message. The background is a soft, ethereal blend of pastel pinks and lavenders. Graceful, sweeping arcs of luminous stardust and tiny, shimmering star-like particles curve elegantly around the central space, creating a beautiful, celestial frame. Nestled within this delicate cosmic swirl, the message is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, appearing as if written with liquid starlight. The text reads: 'Happy birthday! I was going to make a joke about you getting old, but then I realized I didn't want to be reminded that I'm right there with you. Hope you have a fantastic day! - Jason'. The overall effect is elegant, magical, and personal, seamlessly integrating the message into the artwork.
